title: Honor Me
description: Joe and Suzy Gallo have everything they ever wanted and are living the American dream. Just when life has evened out, a familiar enemy comes back to haunt them. It isn't his past that's followed them, but his brother's. When the danger gets too close, he'll do anything to defend his family.There's nothing more important than the people he loves, and he'll protect what's his no matter the cost.
author: Chelle Bliss
